The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--006a51241073e994b41acfe9ec718e94-->
### Code Coverage
For detailed information about the code coverage, see the [test coverage report](https://corecheck.dev/bitcoin/bitcoin/pulls/28981).
<!--021abf342d371248e50ceaed478a90ca-->
### Reviews
See [the guideline](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#code-review) for information on the review process.
| Type | Reviewers |
| ---- | --------- |
| Concept ACK | [TheCharlatan](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28981#issuecomment-1835740522) |

If your review is incorrectly listed, please react with ð to this comment and the bot will ignore it on the next update.
<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#28967](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28967) (build: disable external-signer for Windows by fanquake)
* [#28286](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28286) (test: Minor fix in test - locale in terminal by crywolf)
* [#27897](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/27897) (guix: use GCC 12.3.0 to build releases by fanquake)
* [#25972](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/25972) (build: no-longer disable WARN_CXXFLAGS when CXXFLAGS is set by fanquake)
* [#25573](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/25573) ([POC] guix: produce a fully `-static-pie` bitcoind by fanquake)
* [#22417](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22417) (util/system: Close non-std fds when execing slave processes by luke-jr)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
